item.description:
We play at 8pm on the football field at Russell Field by Alewife Station. We generally play til 10ish and will party and snack out on the field afterwards. Before attending our events, please review our About Us page.



Please bring a light-colored shirt for visibility's sake, water and a smiling face. We'll provide cones, frisbees, glowsticks and fun new friends.

Our Organizers pay out of pocket for the equipment. If you wish to donate, consider bringing a couple bucks or visit our Amazon Wishlist

Click here to see a full Google map of the area. If you Red Line to Alewife, look for signs upon exiting that will direct you to Russell Field. Parking- across the street at the Summer Shack, or by the field where street signs allow.

If you have any questions about, don't hesitate to contact the Organizers!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be tossing frisbees or sitting alongside the football field. Look for Mat in a bright orange shirt.
item.why: Because you're a fun, exciting person, and we're a fun loving, exhilarating community of frisbee players!
item.name: Illuminated Frisbee Awesomeness
